subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jason Giambi became the second-oldest player to hit three home runs in a game and tied his career high with seven runs batted in, leading the Colorado Rockies past the Philadelphia Phillies, 7-1, on Thursday.
snippet: Jason Giambi became the second-oldest player to hit three home runs in a game and tied his career high with seven runs batted in, leading the Colorado Rockies past the Philadelphia Phillies, 7-1, on Thursday.
